caption.title: The log 10 mean biomass Â± S.E. of redcedars of half and full fertilization (30 g m -2) under control (closed circles) and shade (open triangles).
caption.p: a) Total biomass. b) Aboveground biomass. b) Belowground biomass. There were no significant interaction effects between shade and fertilizer nor a significant main effect for fertilizer.
